title: description
Sour baltic-style porter: An estranged step-cousin to thewood- and barrel-aged pale to amber beer. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm strudel dipped in a Pickled fruit

title: notes
Sour baltic-style porter: Pickled onion, window, cinnamon roll, and fresh New green peas

title: pairing
Sour baltic-style porter: Goes well with a muffin dipped in a rotten Biber salçası

title: serving_suggestion
Sour baltic-style porter: Enjoy freezingly cold, on a rotten yacht
